H3.text: when did the continental congress vote to adopt the declaration of independence. July 2 , 1776

A5.text: Congress finally approved the resolution of independence on July 2, 1776. They next turned their attention to a formal explanation of this decision, the United States Declaration of Independence which was approved on July 4 and published soon thereafter.

A6.text: the United States Declaration of Independence which was approved on July 4
